title: Hardcoded Secrets
description: Potential hardcoded secrets found in workflow file
recommendation: Use GitHub Secrets for all sensitive data

title: Potential Log Exposure
description: Echo statements found that might expose sensitive data
recommendation: Avoid echoing variables that might contain secrets

title: SSH Key Management Missing
description: No SSH key setup found in workflow

title: Root User Usage
description: Vault service configured to run as root user
recommendation: Consider running Vault as dedicated vault user for better security

title: TLS Disabled
description: TLS is disabled for Vault listener

title: Open Network Binding
description: Vault configured to listen on all interfaces
recommendation: Consider restricting listener to specific interfaces

title: API Address Security
recommendation: Use HTTPS for API addresses in production

title: Command Injection Risk
description: Unquoted variables found in shell commands (3 instances)
recommendation: Quote all variables used in shell commands

title: Key Storage Location
recommendation: Consider more secure key storage solutions

title: Root Token Handling
description: Root token operations found in workflow
recommendation: Minimize root token usage and ensure secure handling
